mapper.select: SELECT * FROM icbc_lawsuit WHERE `status` = 1 group by icbc_id

select ki.id, ki.gems_code, ki.c_name, ki.c_tel , ki.c_cardno, kik.cars_type, ass.c_carno, ag.`name` gems_name, af.`name` fs_name, kik.zdr_xzdz, kik.zdr_gzdw, kik.zdr_dwdh, kik.zdr_dwdz, yl.name yl_name from kj_icbc ki, kjs_icbc_kk kik, assess_fs af, assess_gems ag , assess_cars ass, yl_banklist yl where ki.id=kik.icbc_id and ki.gems_fs_id=af.id and ki.gems_id=ag.id and ki.id=ass.icbc_id and ki.bank_id=yl.id and ki.id=#{icbc_id}

SELECT ass.c_carno, ass.icbc_pricecs, ass.cars_type, ass.motorcode, dit.carvin, kj.id FROM kj_icbc kj, assess_cars ass, kjs_icbc_preaudit dit WHERE kj.id = ass.icbc_id AND kj.id = dit.icbc_id and kj.id=#{icbc_id}

SELECT kk.dk_total_price, kk.kp_price, kk.sfje, kk.aj_date, kk.dk_lv, kk.jrfw_price, kk.dk_price, yh.NAME y_name, kj.id FROM yl_banklist yh, kj_icbc kj, kjs_icbc_kk kk WHERE kj.id = kk.icbc_id AND yh.id = kj.bank_id AND kj.id = #{icbc_id}
select * from icbc_repayment_schedule where icbc_id=#{icbc_id} and overdue=1 order by should_date asc
